lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics:
Sirsaya hegu
jimi daicha biugu 2x
wa hegu kasa nise
mana thatay lata
ulsa nise man farke jula 2x

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: yocha swoya dhe dhe chu\nfelu swoya fa fa swa
jimi daicha hila hila\nfuka deka bila re\nulsa nise man farke jula 2x

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics:
tyanka tyanka tangacha
hantha hantha hanthacha 2x
jimi daicha dayka bila
hisadeka lawacha
ulsa nise man farke jula 2x

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics: wahe lana fina daicha\npaaju pintha wanaka\nulasa nise man farke jula 2x

lyrics.name: Verse
lyrics:
sirsaya hegu
jimi daicha biugu 2x
wa heku kasa nisemana thatay lata
ulsa nise man farke jula 2x
